name: cargo-mty-app
description: Application to parse files and clean them

scripts.compile-all: npm run compile-py && npm run compile-ts
scripts.copy-all: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css
scripts.build: npm run compile-all && npm run copy-all
scripts.start: npm run secure-run && npm run clean && npm run build && electron . --trace-warnings && npm run clean
scripts.start-debug: npm run secure-run && npm run build && electron . --trace-warnings
scripts.secure-run: if NOT "%cd%" == "%INIT_CWD%" (echo Error: This script must be run from the project root. & exit 1) else (echo Running script...)
scripts.clean: if exist "./dist" rmdir /s /q "./dist" && if exist "./build" rmdir /s /q "./build" && if exist "./engine/dist" rmdir /s /q "./engine/dist" && if exist "./engine/py_build" rmdir /s /q "./engine/py_build"

author: adrianmtztrev
